scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:watch: npm run build:css:watch & npm run build:js:watch
scripts.package: npm run build && electron-packager . "User Management App" --platform=darwin --arch=arm64 --out=dist --ignore=node_modules/sqlite3-backup
scripts.package:mac: npm run build && electron-packager . "User Management App" --platform=darwin --arch=arm64 --out=dist --overwrite
scripts.package:win: npm run build && electron-packager . "User Management App" --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --out=dist --overwrite
scripts.package:all: npm run build && electron-packager . "User Management App" --platform=darwin,win32 --arch=arm64,x64 --out=dist --overwrite
scripts.create:mac: npm run package:mac && cd dist && hdiutil create -volname "User Management App" -srcfolder "User Management App-darwin-arm64" -ov -format UDZO "User Management App-1.0.0.dmg"
scripts.create:win: npm run package:win && cd dist && powershell -Command "Compress-Archive -Path 'User Management App-win32-x64' -DestinationPath 'User Management App-1.0.0-win.zip' -Force"
